description: Represents Record related metrics for a single day

id.description: Value of key that metric is grouped by (which defaults to display_collection)

total_active_records.description: Total number of active records for this group

total_new_records.description: Total number of new records harvested on this day for group

category_counts.description: Object with the keys being the category name, values being the count

copyright_counts.description: Object with the keys being the copyright type, values being the count
